entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:35 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
